project-demos.name: Cold Call Tracker
project-demos.description: Cold Call Tracker is a web application for managing and tracking cold call leads with integration to Exa.ai websets API for company data and contact information. Ivy is a web framework for building interactive web applications using C# and .NET.

project-demos.name: Course-template
project-demos.description: Course Template is a web application template for creating and managing structured educational courses with modules, themes, sections, and interactive content.

project-demos.name: Vc
project-demos.description: Vc is a CRM system for venture capital firms to manage startups, deals, founders, partners, and industries with comprehensive tracking and analytics capabilities. Ivy is a web framework for building interactive web applications using C# and .NET.

project-demos.name: Hello
project-demos.description: Hello is a simple starter application demonstrating the basic structure and setup of an Ivy web application. Ivy is a web framework for building interactive web applications using C# and .NET.

project-demos.name: OpperAI Chat
project-demos.description: OpperAI Chat is a web application for interactive AI-powered conversations using Opper.ai API with support for multiple AI models, conversation context, custom instructions, and mathematical expression rendering.

project-demos.name: Snowflake
project-demos.description: Snowflake Database Explorer is a web application for exploring Snowflake databases with interactive navigation through databases, schemas, and tables, real-time statistics, table structure inspection, and paginated data preview. https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/bc069ffb-d36f-4eb8-a4da-f279db05d959 https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/7fec362b-3fd5-4050-aaf5-4147c229b6eb

package-demos.name: HtmlAgilityPack
package-demos.description: HtmlAgilityPack is a web application for parsing and analyzing HTML from websites with DOM structure extraction, content analysis, and XPath query support.

package-demos.name: Aspose.BarCode Generator
package-demos.description: Aspose.BarCode Generator is a web application for generating barcodes in multiple symbologies with adjustable sizes, live preview, and downloadable output.

package-demos.name: Aspose.OCR Image-to-Text
package-demos.description: Aspose.OCR Image-to-Text is a web application for extracting text from images using OCR technology with image upload, text recognition, and formatted output display.

package-demos.name: Aspose.Words
package-demos.description: Aspose.Words is a web application for generating professional Word documents with template support, dynamic content insertion, and document manipulation capabilities.

package-demos.name: BarcodeLib
package-demos.description: BarcodeLib is a web application for generating barcodes in multiple symbologies with customizable options, live preview, and downloadable PNG output.

package-demos.name: Bogus
package-demos.description: Bogus is a web application for generating realistic fake data for testing and development with customizable fruit lists and randomized order generation.

package-demos.name: ClosedXML
package-demos.description: ClosedXML is a demonstration application for managing Excel workbooks with capabilities to create, edit, view, and manipulate Excel files including columns, rows, and data validation.

package-demos.name: AWS Constructs
package-demos.description: AWS Constructs is a web application for building composable configuration models with hierarchical construct structures, interactive tree navigation, and dynamic node management.

package-demos.name: Cronos
package-demos.description: Cronos is a web application for parsing and validating cron expressions with timezone support, next occurrence calculation, and predefined template patterns.

package-demos.name: CSV Helper
package-demos.description: CSV Helper is a web application for managing product data with CSV import and export capabilities, allowing users to create, view, and bulk import products from CSV files.

package-demos.name: DiffEngine
package-demos.description: DiffEngine is a web application for launching external diff tools to compare text files side-by-side with automatic tool detection and file comparison capabilities.

package-demos.name: DiffPlex â€“ Text Comparison Tool
package-demos.description: DiffPlex is a web application for comparing two text blocks and visualizing differences with highlighted insertions, deletions, modifications, and unchanged content. An Ivy example demonstrating text comparison and diff visualization using the DiffPlex library.

package-demos.name: Dnsclient
package-demos.description: DNS Client is a web application for performing DNS lookups with support for multiple record types, reverse DNS queries, and detailed DNS information display.

package-demos.name: Enums.NET
package-demos.description: Enums.NET is a web application for exploring and manipulating enum types with advanced operations including flag manipulation, validation, parsing, and attribute handling.

package-demos.name: EPPlus
package-demos.description: EPPlus is a web application for managing Excel workbooks with capabilities to create, read, write, and manipulate Excel files including adding books, viewing data, and downloading workbooks.

package-demos.name: ExcelDataReader
package-demos.description: ExcelDataReader is a web application for analyzing Excel and CSV files with worksheet browsing, data preview, and file information display.

package-demos.name: FastMember
package-demos.description: FastMember is a web application demonstrating high-performance runtime member access with performance benchmarks comparing FastMember against Reflection, PropertyDescriptor, and Dynamic C#.

package-demos.name: FluentDateTime
package-demos.description: FluentDateTime is a web application for date and time calculations with fluent syntax, supporting date arithmetic, relative time expressions, and formatted output.

package-demos.name: FuzzySharp
package-demos.description: FuzzySharp is a web application for intelligent fuzzy text search with support for typos, misspellings, and partial matches using multiple matching algorithms.

package-demos.name: GitHub
package-demos.description: GitHub is a web application for retrieving and displaying GitHub user statistics including profile information, repository data, commits, pull requests, and contribution metrics.

package-demos.name: Handlebars.Net
package-demos.description: Handlebars.Net is a web application for HTML template generation using Handlebars syntax with data binding, helpers, and compiled template rendering.

package-demos.name: Humanizer
package-demos.description: Humanizer is a web application for text transformation with support for multiple formats including PascalCase, camelCase, kebab-case, underscore_case, and smart truncation.

package-demos.name: IbanNet
package-demos.description: IbanNet is a web application for IBAN validation and generation with support for international bank account numbers, country-specific formats, and detailed validation results.

package-demos.name: JWT Demo Application
package-demos.description: JWT Demo Application is an interactive web application for generating and validating JSON Web Tokens with support for custom claims, expiration, and detailed token information display. This is an interactive Ivy demo application showcasing JWT (JSON Web Tokens) concepts and integration with the Ivy framework.

package-demos.name: Magick.NET-Q16-AnyCPU
package-demos.description: Magick.NET-Q16-AnyCPU is a web application for comprehensive image processing including format conversion, resizing, filtering, and advanced image manipulation operations.

package-demos.name: Mapster
package-demos.description: Mapster is a web application demonstrating bidirectional object-to-object mapping between Person and PersonDto classes with automatic field combination and validation.

package-demos.name: Microsoft.SemanticKernel
package-demos.description: Microsoft.SemanticKernel is a web application for AI-powered action item extraction from text using GPT-4o-mini, with intelligent text analysis and formatted output display.

package-demos.name: Mimemapping
package-demos.description: MimeMapping is a web application for MIME type detection and file extension mapping with comprehensive file type information and extension lookup capabilities.

package-demos.name: MiniExcel
package-demos.description: MiniExcel is a web application for student management with Excel import and export capabilities, featuring CRUD operations, search, filtering, and real-time data synchronization.

package-demos.name: NAudio
package-demos.description: NAudio is a web application for audio processing with support for audio file playback, format conversion, and audio manipulation capabilities.

package-demos.name: Newtonsoft.Json
package-demos.description: Newtonsoft.Json is a web application demonstrating JSON serialization and deserialization with two-way synchronization between JSON editor and form-based user interface.

package-demos.name: NodaTime
package-demos.description: NodaTime is a web application for timezone conversion and time handling with support for all TZDB timezones, real-time conversion, and formatted time display.

package-demos.name: OllamaSharp
package-demos.description: OllamaSharp is a web application for interactive AI chat using locally running Ollama models with streaming responses, model selection, and real-time conversation interface.

package-demos.name: OpenAIExample
package-demos.description: OpenAIExample demonstrates integration with OpenAI API for AI-powered features including chat, text generation, and natural language processing capabilities. Ivy is a web framework for building interactive web applications using C# and .NET.

package-demos.name: PuppeteerSharp
package-demos.description: PuppeteerSharp is a web application for rendering websites, generating screenshots, and creating PDFs from web pages using headless Chrome browser automation.

package-demos.name: QR Code Generator
package-demos.description: QR Code Generator is a web application for creating QR codes with vCard contact information, allowing users to generate scannable contact cards for easy sharing.

package-demos.name: QuestPDF
package-demos.description: QuestPDF is a demonstration application for generating PDF documents from markdown content with real-time preview, customizable page settings, and interactive editing capabilities.

package-demos.name: RestSharp
package-demos.description: RestSharp is a web application for testing REST APIs with support for multiple HTTP methods, JSON request/response handling, and interactive API client interface.

package-demos.name: Scriban
package-demos.description: Scriban is a web application for template rendering using Liquid-like syntax with JSON model support, real-time validation, and formatted output generation.

package-demos.name: Serialize.Linq
package-demos.description: Serialize.Linq is a web application for serializing and deserializing LINQ expressions to JSON, enabling expression storage, transmission, and dynamic evaluation.

package-demos.name: SharpYaml
package-demos.description: SharpYaml is a web application for converting JSON to YAML format with syntax-highlighted editing, instant conversion, and error handling.

package-demos.name: ShopifySharp
package-demos.description: ShopifySharp is a web application for browsing Shopify store product catalogs with product listing, details, and integration with Shopify API.

package-demos.name: SimMetrics.Net
package-demos.description: SimMetrics.Net is a web application for measuring string similarity and distance using multiple algorithms including Levenshtein, Jaro-Winkler, Cosine, and Jaccard.

package-demos.name: SmartFormat.NET
package-demos.description: SmartFormat.NET is a web application for dynamic string formatting with rich templating, named placeholders, conditional sections, and pluralization support.

package-demos.name: Stripe.net
package-demos.description: Stripe.net is a web application for creating Stripe checkout sessions with configurable products, amounts, currencies, and payment processing integration.

package-demos.name: Superpower
package-demos.description: Superpower is a web application demonstrating parser-combinator capabilities with multiple parser examples including JSON, CSV, and custom format parsers.

package-demos.name: TimeZoneNames
package-demos.description: TimeZoneNames is a web application for time zone conversion and lookup with support for IANA, Windows, and Rails time zone identifiers.

package-demos.name: ULID
package-demos.description: ULID is a web application for generating and parsing ULID identifiers with timestamp extraction, sortable unique IDs, and detailed ULID information display.

package-demos.name: UnitsNet
package-demos.description: UnitsNet is a web application for unit conversion with support for multiple quantity types including temperature, length, mass, volume, and comprehensive unit systems.

package-demos.name: XLParser
package-demos.description: XLParser is a web application for parsing and analyzing Excel formulas with token visualization, parse tree display, and detailed formula structure analysis.

package-demos.name: YamlDotNet
package-demos.description: YamlDotNet is a web application for YAML serialization and deserialization with real-time conversion between C# objects and YAML format, including field validation and error handling.

package-demos.name: ZString
package-demos.description: ZString is a web application demonstrating high-performance string operations with zero-allocation string formatting and memory-efficient string manipulation.
